name: FetchUserTaskDetails
description:
Retrieve the full record for a user task list.

Call this tool to obtain detailed information about a specific user's task list in Asana. This requires read permissions on tasks.

parameters.name: user_task_list_global_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the user task list in Asana.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the user task list.

parameters.name: include_optional_properties
parameters.description: Specify which optional properties should be included in the response. Provide as a list of strings.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true for readable, indented JSON output. Use primarily for debugging due to increased response size.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.
